title: Dear Congress: Pry Those Guns From Our Cold, Dead Fingers
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Parents - Today 
In 2012, 986 mass shootings ago, I wrote these words: ""In the wake of another horrific national tragedy, it's easy to talk about guns. But ...
